data.description: A Templating system for SVG based on SVG.pm
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module is specific to SVG, and provides templating
    functionality based on id tags within an SVG document.

    The module will provide a base class for modules like
    SVG::Template::Graph , SVG::Template::Game , or such namespaces.

    I've also already built SVG::Template::Graph, which will use
    SVG::Template as a base class.

    The closest existing module that provides similar functionality is
    the SVG::TT::* module tree by Leo Lapworth. Leo uses Template
    Toolkit in his module.

    Ronan
